Name: Deceptus
About the game: Expect mayhem and chaos! An original Arena shooter with up to 8 players, featuring true cross play against console, mobile or PC devices! Kill everyone, collect the death coins and earn bonuses or collect and unlock special cosmetic powers, new levels and new characters! At random times that nobody can predict, a red light will go on. No players are allowed to move or jump during this time or they will perish fast and loose one kill score. Players will however be able to aim and shoot at each other while the red light is on. Ow and of course players can through grenades as well.
